attributes.action: Introduce minimum speed limits to reduce traffic on motorways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every time i go to work in the mornings there is always some idiot doing 50mph in the middle overtaking lane when not overtaking anyone, this causes miles of tail backs and i wish to remove their right to cause gridlock with their "sensible" driving.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
